Title: The Zunyi Meeting
Notes: The poster recounts the Zunyi meeting, from 15-17 January 1935. A collage of historical photographs of those who participated in the meeting, including Mao Zedong, Zhou Enlai, Zhu De, Wang Jiaxiang, Zhang Wentian, Chen Yun, Liu Shaoqi and Deng Fa. The Congress proceedings and decisions; an artistic reconstruction of the Meeting (a Chinese painting by Liu Xiangping) and an oil painting ("Towards victory") by Peng Bin.
